author: TooMuchDew
title: Snowman test mini build
review:
This is the same Snowman from "Advent Calendar 2008, City (Day 24) Female and Snowman" www.bricklink.com/catalogItem.asp?S=7724-25
I didn't attend the December build event, I got this from a friend. To the best of my knowledge, the Mall of America LEGO Imagination Center store did a small test build in December as a trial run to gauge interest before the first official Monthly Mini Model Build on Tuesday, January 6, 2008 [not an official MMMB, no instruction card printed]
